entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
